AbnormalTraffic.title: AbnormalTraffic
AbnormalTraffic.description: A traffic condition which is not normal.

abnormalTrafficType.title: abnormalTrafficType
abnormalTrafficType.description: A characterization of the nature of abnormal traffic flow, i.e. specifically relating to the nature of the traffic movement, implying a level of service.

numberOfVehiclesWaiting.title: numberOfVehiclesWaiting
numberOfVehiclesWaiting.description: The number of vehicles waiting in a queue.

queueLength.title: queueLength
queueLength.description: The length of a queue or the average length of queues in separate lanes due to a situation.

relativeTrafficFlow.title: relativeTrafficFlow
relativeTrafficFlow.description: Assessment of the traffic flow conditions relative to normally expected conditions at this date/time.

trafficFlowCharacteristics.title: trafficFlowCharacteristics
trafficFlowCharacteristics.description: The consistency (steadiness) of the traffic flow.

trafficTrendType.title: trafficTrendType
trafficTrendType.description: A characterization of the trend in the traffic conditions at the specified location and direction.

AbnormalTrafficTypeEnum.title: AbnormalTrafficTypeEnum
AbnormalTrafficTypeEnum.description: Descriptive terms for abnormal traffic conditions specifically relating to the nature of the traffic movement, implying levels of service.

Accident.title: Accident
Accident.description: Accidents are events where one or more vehicles are involved in collisions or in leaving the roadway. These include collisions between vehicles or with other road users or obstacles.

accidentCause.title: accidentCause
accidentCause.description: A descriptor indicating the most significant factor causing an accident.

accidentType.title: accidentType
accidentType.description: A characterization of the nature of the accident.

totalNumberOfPeopleInvolved.title: totalNumberOfPeopleInvolved
totalNumberOfPeopleInvolved.description: The total number of people that are involved.

totalNumberOfVehiclesInvolved.title: totalNumberOfVehiclesInvolved
totalNumberOfVehiclesInvolved.description: The total number of vehicles that are involved.

vehicleInvolved.title: vehicleInvolved
vehicleInvolved.description: The vehicle involved in the accident.

AccidentCauseEnum.title: AccidentCauseEnum
AccidentCauseEnum.description: Collection of the type of accident causes.

AccidentTypeEnum.title: AccidentTypeEnum
AccidentTypeEnum.description: Collection of descriptive terms for types of accidents.

Activity.title: Activity
Activity.description: Deliberate human action external to the traffic stream or roadway which could disrupt traffic.

AnimalPresenceObstruction.title: AnimalPresenceObstruction
AnimalPresenceObstruction.description: An obstruction on the road resulting from the presence of animals.

alive.title: alive
alive.description: Indicates whether the identified animals are dead (immobile) or alive (potentially mobile).

animalPresenceType.title: animalPresenceType
animalPresenceType.description: Indicates the nature of animals present on or near the roadway.

AuthorityOperation.title: AuthorityOperation
AuthorityOperation.description: Authority initiated operation or activity that could disrupt traffic.

authorityOperationType.title: authorityOperationType
authorityOperationType.description: Type of authority initiated operation or activity that could disrupt traffic.

Cause.title: Cause
Cause.description: Contains details of the cause of a record within a situation

causeDescription.title: causeDescription
causeDescription.description: Description of a cause which is not managed by the publication creator (e.g. an off network cause).

causeType.title: causeType
causeType.description: Indicates an external influence that may be the causation of components of a situation.

detailedCauseType.title: detailedCauseType
detailedCauseType.description: The type of cause, expressed in more detail than the NonManagedCause causeType. If both are present then they must be consistent.

managedCause.title: managedCause
managedCause.description: A reference to another situation record which defines a cause of the event defined here.

CauseTypeEnum.title: CauseTypeEnum
CauseTypeEnum.description: Types of causes of situations which are not managed or are off network.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: A free text comment with an optional date/time stamp that can be used by the operator to convey un-coded observations/information.

comment.title: comment
comment.description: A free text comment that can be used by the operator to convey un-coded observations/information.

commentDateTime.title: commentDateTime
commentDateTime.description: The date/time at which the comment was made.

commentType.title: commentType
commentType.description: A classification of the the type of comment.

Conditions.title: Conditions
Conditions.description: Any conditions which have the potential to degrade normal driving conditions.

drivingConditionType.title: drivingConditionType
drivingConditionType.description: Description of the driving conditions at the specified location.

ConstructionWorks.title: ConstructionWorks
ConstructionWorks.description: Roadworks involving the construction of new infrastructure.

constructionWorkType.title: constructionWorkType
constructionWorkType.description: The type of construction work being performed.

ConstructionWorkTypeEnum.title: ConstructionWorkTypeEnum
ConstructionWorkTypeEnum.description: Types of works relating to construction.

DelayBandEnum.title: DelayBandEnum
DelayBandEnum.description: Classifications of a delay banded by length (i.e. the additional travel time).

Delays.title: Delays
Delays.description: The details of the delays being caused by the situation element defined in the situation record. It is recommended to only use one of the optional attributes to avoid confusion.

delayBand.title: delayBand
delayBand.description: The time band within which the additional travel time due to adverse travel conditions of any kind falls, when compared to "normal conditions".

delayTimeValue.title: delayTimeValue
delayTimeValue.description: The value of the additional travel time due to adverse travel conditions of any kind, when compared to "normal conditions", given in seconds.

DetailedCauseType.title: DetailedCauseType
DetailedCauseType.description: The type of influence that may be the cause of components of a situation. At least one attribute must be populated.

abnormalTrafficType.title: abnormalTrafficType
abnormalTrafficType.description: A characterization of the nature of abnormal traffic flow, i.e. specifically relating to the nature of the traffic movement.

accidentType.title: accidentType
accidentType.description: A characterization of the nature of the accident.

animalPresenceType.title: animalPresenceType
animalPresenceType.description: Indicates the nature of animals present on or near the roadway.

authorityOperationType.title: authorityOperationType
authorityOperationType.description: Type of authority initiated operation or activity that could disrupt traffic.

constructionWorkType.title: constructionWorkType
constructionWorkType.description: The type of construction work being performed.

disturbanceActivityType.title: disturbanceActivityType
disturbanceActivityType.description: Includes all situations of a public disorder type or of an alert type, with potential to disrupt traffic.

drivingConditionType.title: drivingConditionType
drivingConditionType.description: Description of the driving conditions at the specified location.

environmentalObstructionType.title: environmentalObstructionType
environmentalObstructionType.description: Characterization of an obstruction on the road resulting from an environmental cause.

equipmentOrSystemFaultType.title: equipmentOrSystemFaultType
equipmentOrSystemFaultType.description: Failure, malfunction or non operational condition of equipment or system.

generalInstructionToRoadUsersType.title: generalInstructionToRoadUsersType
generalInstructionToRoadUsersType.description: General instruction that is issued by the network/road operator which is applicable to drivers and sometimes passengers.

generalNetworkManagementType.title: generalNetworkManagementType
generalNetworkManagementType.description: The type of traffic management action instigated by the network/road operator.

infrastructureDamageType.title: infrastructureDamageType
infrastructureDamageType.description: Characterization of an obstruction on the road resulting from the failure or damage of infrastructure on, under, above or close to the road.

nonWeatherRelatedRoadConditionType.title: nonWeatherRelatedRoadConditionType
nonWeatherRelatedRoadConditionType.description: The type of road conditions which are not related to the weather.

obstructionType.title: obstructionType
obstructionType.description: Characterization of the type of general obstruction.

poorEnvironmentType.title: poorEnvironmentType
poorEnvironmentType.description: The type of environment condition which is affecting driving conditions.

publicEventType.title: publicEventType
publicEventType.description: Type of public event which could disrupt traffic.

reroutingManagementType.title: reroutingManagementType
reroutingManagementType.description: Type of rerouting management action instigated by operator.

roadMaintenanceType.title: roadMaintenanceType
roadMaintenanceType.description: The type of road maintenance or installation work at the specified location.

roadOperatorServiceDisruptionType.title: roadOperatorServiceDisruptionType
roadOperatorServiceDisruptionType.description: The type of road operator service which is disrupted.

roadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagementType.title: roadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagementType
roadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagementType.description: Type of road, carriageway or lane management action instigated by operator.

roadsideAssistanceType.title: roadsideAssistanceType
roadsideAssistanceType.description: Indicates the nature of the road side assistance that will be, is or has been provided.

roadsideServiceDisruptionType.title: roadsideServiceDisruptionType
roadsideServiceDisruptionType.description: The type of roadside service which is disrupted.

speedManagementType.title: speedManagementType
speedManagementType.description: Type of speed management action instigated by operator.

vehicleObstructionType.title: vehicleObstructionType
vehicleObstructionType.description: Characterization of an obstruction on the road caused by one or more vehicles.

weatherRelatedRoadConditionType.title: weatherRelatedRoadConditionType
weatherRelatedRoadConditionType.description: The type of road surface condition that is related to the weather which is affecting the driving conditions.

winterEquipmentManagementType.title: winterEquipmentManagementType
winterEquipmentManagementType.description: Type of winter equipment management action instigated by operator.

DisturbanceActivity.title: DisturbanceActivity
DisturbanceActivity.description: Deliberate human action of either a public disorder nature or of a situation alert type which could disrupt traffic.

disturbanceActivityType.title: disturbanceActivityType
disturbanceActivityType.description: Includes all situations of a public disorder type or of an alert type, with potential to disrupt traffic.

DrivingConditionTypeEnum.title: DrivingConditionTypeEnum
DrivingConditionTypeEnum.description: Types of the perceived driving conditions.

EnvironmentalObstruction.title: EnvironmentalObstruction
EnvironmentalObstruction.description: An obstruction on the road resulting from an environmental cause.

depth.title: depth
depth.description: The depth of flooding or of snow on the road.

environmentalObstructionType.title: environmentalObstructionType
environmentalObstructionType.description: Characterization of an obstruction on the road resulting from an environmental cause.

EquipmentOrSystemFault.title: EquipmentOrSystemFault
EquipmentOrSystemFault.description: Equipment or system which is faulty, malfunctioning or not in a fully operational state that may be of interest or concern to road operators and road users.

equipmentOrSystemFaultType.title: equipmentOrSystemFaultType
equipmentOrSystemFaultType.description: Failure, malfunction or non operational condition of equipment or system.

faultyEquipmentOrSystemType.title: faultyEquipmentOrSystemType
faultyEquipmentOrSystemType.description: The type of equipment or system which is faulty, malfunctioning or not in a fully operational state.

EquipmentOrSystemFaultTypeEnum.title: EquipmentOrSystemFaultTypeEnum
EquipmentOrSystemFaultTypeEnum.description: Types of fault, malfunctioning or non operational conditions of equipment or systems.

EquipmentOrSystemTypeEnum.title: EquipmentOrSystemTypeEnum
EquipmentOrSystemTypeEnum.description: Types of equipment and systems used to support the operation of the road network.

GeneralInstructionOrMessageToRoadUsers.title: GeneralInstructionOrMessageToRoadUsers
GeneralInstructionOrMessageToRoadUsers.description: General instruction and/or message that is issued by the network/road operator which is applicable to drivers and sometimes passengers.

generalInstructionToRoadUsersType.title: generalInstructionToRoadUsersType
generalInstructionToRoadUsersType.description: General instruction that is issued by the network/road operator which is applicable to drivers and sometimes passengers.

generalMessageToRoadUsers.title: generalMessageToRoadUsers
generalMessageToRoadUsers.description: General message that is issued by the network/road operator which is applicable to drivers and sometimes passengers, e.g. details about an amber alert (missing or abducted child alert).

GeneralInstructionToRoadUsersTypeEnum.title: GeneralInstructionToRoadUsersTypeEnum
GeneralInstructionToRoadUsersTypeEnum.description: General instructions that may be issued to road users (specifically drivers and sometimes passengers) by an operator or operational system in support of network management activities or emergency situations.

GeneralNetworkManagement.title: GeneralNetworkManagement
GeneralNetworkManagement.description: Network management action that is instigated either manually or automatically by the network/road operator.  Compliance with any resulting control may be advisory or mandatory.

generalNetworkManagementType.title: generalNetworkManagementType
generalNetworkManagementType.description: The type of traffic management action instigated by the network/road operator.

trafficManuallyDirectedBy.title: trafficManuallyDirectedBy
trafficManuallyDirectedBy.description: Type of person that is manually directing traffic (applicable if generalNetworkManagementType is set to "trafficBeingManuallyDirected").

GeneralObstruction.title: GeneralObstruction
GeneralObstruction.description: Any stationary or moving obstacle of a physical nature, other than of an animal, vehicle, environmental, or damaged equipment nature.

obstructionType.title: obstructionType
obstructionType.description: Characterization of the type of general obstruction.

GenericSituationRecord.title: GenericSituationRecord
GenericSituationRecord.description: A generic SituationRecord for use when adding level B extensions at the SituationRecord level.

GroupOfPeopleInvolved.title: GroupOfPeopleInvolved
GroupOfPeopleInvolved.description: Group of people involved in the event having common characteristics and/or status.

numberOfPeople.title: numberOfPeople
numberOfPeople.description: The number of people of this group that are involved.

injuryStatusType.title: injuryStatusType
injuryStatusType.description: The injury status of the people involved.

involvementRole.title: involvementRole
involvementRole.description: The involvement role of the people.

Impact.title: Impact
Impact.description: An assessment of the impact that an event or operator action defined by the situation record has on the driving conditions.

capacityRemaining.title: capacityRemaining
capacityRemaining.description: The ratio of current capacity to the normal (free flow) road capacity in the defined direction, expressed as a percentage. Capacity is the maximum number of vehicles that can pass a specified point on the road, in unit time given the specified conditions.

numberOfLanesRestricted.title: numberOfLanesRestricted
numberOfLanesRestricted.description: The number of normally usable lanes on the carriageway which are now restricted either fully or partially (this may include the hard shoulder if it is normally available for operational use, e.g. in hard shoulder running schemes).

numberOfOperationalLanes.title: numberOfOperationalLanes
numberOfOperationalLanes.description: The number of usable lanes in the specified direction which remain fully operational (this may include the hard shoulder if it is being used as an operational lane).

residualLaneWidth.title: residualLaneWidth
residualLaneWidth.description: The width of lanes after any lane narrowing

residualRoadWidth.title: residualRoadWidth
residualRoadWidth.description: The total width of the combined operational lanes in the specified direction.

InfrastructureDamageObstruction.title: InfrastructureDamageObstruction
InfrastructureDamageObstruction.description: An obstruction on the road resulting from the failure or damage of infrastructure on, under, above or close to the road.

infrastructureDamageType.title: infrastructureDamageType
infrastructureDamageType.description: Characterization of an obstruction on the road resulting from the failure or damage of infrastructure on, under, above or close to the road.

InfrastructureDamageTypeEnum.title: InfrastructureDamageTypeEnum
InfrastructureDamageTypeEnum.description: Types of infrastructure damage which may have an effect on the road network.

InjuryStatusTypeEnum.title: InjuryStatusTypeEnum
InjuryStatusTypeEnum.description: Types of injury status of people.

InvolvementRolesEnum.title: InvolvementRolesEnum
InvolvementRolesEnum.description: Involvement role of a person in event.

MaintenanceVehicleActionsEnum.title: MaintenanceVehicleActionsEnum
MaintenanceVehicleActionsEnum.description: Types of maintenance vehicle actions associated with roadworks.

MaintenanceVehicles.title: MaintenanceVehicles
MaintenanceVehicles.description: Details of the maintenance vehicles involved in the roadworks activity.

numberOfMaintenanceVehicles.title: numberOfMaintenanceVehicles
numberOfMaintenanceVehicles.description: The number of maintenance vehicles associated with the roadworks activities at the specified location.

maintenanceVehicleActions.title: maintenanceVehicleActions
maintenanceVehicleActions.description: The actions of the maintenance vehicles associated with the roadworks activities.

MaintenanceWorks.title: MaintenanceWorks
MaintenanceWorks.description: Roadworks involving the maintenance or installation of infrastructure.

roadMaintenanceType.title: roadMaintenanceType
roadMaintenanceType.description: The type of road maintenance or installation work at the specified location.

Mobility.title: Mobility
Mobility.description: An indication of whether the associated instance of a SituationRecord is mobile (e.g. a march or parade moving along a road) or stationary.

mobilityType.title: mobilityType
mobilityType.description: An indication of whether the associated instance of a SituationRecord is mobile (e.g. a march or parade moving along a road) or stationary.

MobilityTypeEnum.title: MobilityTypeEnum
MobilityTypeEnum.description: Types of mobility relating to a situation element defined by a SituationReord.

NetworkManagement.title: NetworkManagement
NetworkManagement.description: Network management action which is applicable to the road network and its users.

complianceOption.title: complianceOption
complianceOption.description: Defines whether the network management instruction or the control resulting from a network management action is advisory or mandatory.

applicableForTrafficDirection.title: applicableForTrafficDirection
applicableForTrafficDirection.description: The ultimate traffic direction to which the network management is applicable.

applicableForTrafficType.title: applicableForTrafficType
applicableForTrafficType.description: The type of traffic to which the network management is applicable.

placesAtWhichApplicable.title: placesAtWhichApplicable
placesAtWhichApplicable.description: Places, in generic terms, at which the network management applies.

automaticallyInitiated.title: automaticallyInitiated
automaticallyInitiated.description: Defines whether the network management is initiated by an automatic system.

forVehiclesWithCharacteristicsOf.title: forVehiclesWithCharacteristicsOf
forVehiclesWithCharacteristicsOf.description: The characteristics of those vehicles for which the network management is applicable.

NonWeatherRelatedRoadConditions.title: NonWeatherRelatedRoadConditions
NonWeatherRelatedRoadConditions.description: Road surface conditions that are not related to the weather but which may affect driving conditions.

nonWeatherRelatedRoadConditionType.title: nonWeatherRelatedRoadConditionType
nonWeatherRelatedRoadConditionType.description: The type of road conditions which are not related to the weather.

NonWeatherRelatedRoadConditionTypeEnum.title: NonWeatherRelatedRoadConditionTypeEnum
NonWeatherRelatedRoadConditionTypeEnum.description: Types of road surface conditions which are not related to the weather.

Obstruction.title: Obstruction
Obstruction.description: Any stationary or moving obstacle of a physical nature (e.g. obstacles or vehicles from an earlier accident, shed loads on carriageway, rock fall, abnormal or dangerous loads, or animals etc.) which could disrupt or endanger traffic.

numberOfObstructions.title: numberOfObstructions
numberOfObstructions.description: The number of obstructions that are partly or wholly blocking the road.

ObstructionTypeEnum.title: ObstructionTypeEnum
ObstructionTypeEnum.description: Types of obstructions on the roadway.

OperatorAction.title: OperatorAction
OperatorAction.description: Actions that an authorised operator can decide to implement to prevent or help correct dangerous or poor driving conditions, or any actions affecting normal operation of a road.

actionOrigin.title: actionOrigin
actionOrigin.description: Indicates whether the actions to be undertaken by the operator are the result of an internal operation or external influence.

actionPlanIdentifier.title: actionPlanIdentifier
actionPlanIdentifier.description: The identifier of the traffic management action plan to which this action relates.

operatorActionStatus.title: operatorActionStatus
operatorActionStatus.description: The status of the defined operator action.

OperatorActionStatusEnum.title: OperatorActionStatusEnum
OperatorActionStatusEnum.description: List of statuses associated with operator actions.

PoorEnvironmentConditions.title: PoorEnvironmentConditions
PoorEnvironmentConditions.description: Any environmental conditions which may be affecting the driving conditions on the road.

poorEnvironmentType.title: poorEnvironmentType
poorEnvironmentType.description: The type of environment condition which is affecting driving conditions.

ProbabilityOfOccurrenceEnum.title: ProbabilityOfOccurrenceEnum
ProbabilityOfOccurrenceEnum.description: Levels of confidence that the sender has in the information, ordered {certain, probable, risk of}.

PublicEvent.title: PublicEvent
PublicEvent.description: Organised public event which could disrupt traffic.

publicEventType.title: publicEventType
publicEventType.description: Type of public event which could disrupt traffic.

venueName.title: venueName
venueName.description: Name of the venue at which the public event is being held

RelativeTrafficFlowEnum.title: RelativeTrafficFlowEnum
RelativeTrafficFlowEnum.description: Levels of assessment of the traffic flow conditions relative to normally expected conditions at this date/time.

ReroutingManagement.title: ReroutingManagement
ReroutingManagement.description: Rerouting management action that is issued by the network/road operator.

reroutingManagementType.title: reroutingManagementType
reroutingManagementType.description: Type of rerouting management action instigated by operator.

reroutingItineraryDescription.title: reroutingItineraryDescription
reroutingItineraryDescription.description: A description of the rerouting itinerary.

signedRerouting.title: signedRerouting
signedRerouting.description: Indication of whether the rerouting is signed.

alternativeRouteIdentifier.title: alternativeRouteIdentifier
alternativeRouteIdentifier.description: Identity used on signs to identify the alternative route, typically a very short sequence of letters and/or digits

entry.title: entry
entry.description: The specified entry on to another road at which the alternative route commences.

exit.title: exit
exit.description: The specified exit from the normal route/road at which the alternative route commences.

roadOrJunctionNumber.title: roadOrJunctionNumber
roadOrJunctionNumber.description: The intersecting road or the junction at which the alternative route commences.

alternativeRoute.title: alternativeRoute
alternativeRoute.description: The definition of the alternative route (rerouting) specified as an ordered set of locations (itinerary) which may be specific to one or more defined destinations.

destination.title: destination
destination.description: The destination of the rerouting. Use this direct property when there is no detailed Itinerary available.

RoadOperatorServiceDisruption.title: RoadOperatorServiceDisruption
RoadOperatorServiceDisruption.description: Details of disruption to normal road operator services

roadOperatorServiceDisruptionType.title: roadOperatorServiceDisruptionType
roadOperatorServiceDisruptionType.description: The type of road operator service which is disrupted.

RoadOperatorServiceDisruptionTypeEnum.title: RoadOperatorServiceDisruptionTypeEnum
RoadOperatorServiceDisruptionTypeEnum.description: Types of disruption to road operator services relevant to road users.

RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagement.title: RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagement
RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagement.description: Road, carriageway or lane management action that is instigated by the network/road operator.

roadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagementType.title: roadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagementType
roadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagementType.description: Type of road, carriageway or lane management action instigated by operator.

minimumCarOccupancy.title: minimumCarOccupancy
minimumCarOccupancy.description: The minimum number of persons required in a vehicle in order for it to be allowed to transit the specified road section.

RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagementTypeEnu.title: RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagementTypeEnum
RoadOrCarriagewayOrLaneManagementTypeEnu.description: Management actions relating to road, carriageway or lane usage.

RoadsideAssistance.title: RoadsideAssistance
RoadsideAssistance.description: Details of road side assistance required or being given.

roadsideAssistanceType.title: roadsideAssistanceType
roadsideAssistanceType.description: Indicates the nature of the road side assistance that will be, is or has been provided.

RoadSurfaceConditions.title: RoadSurfaceConditions
RoadSurfaceConditions.description: Conditions of the road surface which may affect driving conditions. These may be related to the weather (e.g. ice, snow etc.) or to other conditions (e.g. oil, mud, leaves etc. on the road)

Roadworks.title: Roadworks
Roadworks.description: Road maintenance, installation and construction activities, works in the road, or other construction or maintenance actions that may affect normal operation of a road.

publicTransportAlternative.title: publicTransportAlternative
publicTransportAlternative.description: Describes an available public transport alternative to the normal route

roadworksDurationClassification.title: roadworksDurationClassification
roadworksDurationClassification.description: Indicates in general terms the expected duration of the roadworks.

roadworksIdentifier.title: roadworksIdentifier
roadworksIdentifier.description: An external identifier for the roadworks

roadworksScale.title: roadworksScale
roadworksScale.description: Grade of complexity of the roadworks according to the responsible road operator. For example determined by size, duration and/or traffic disruption.

underTraffic.title: underTraffic
underTraffic.description: Indicates that the road section where the roadworks are located is under traffic or not under traffic. 'True' indicates the road is under traffic.

urgentRoadworks.title: urgentRoadworks
urgentRoadworks.description: Indication of whether the roadworks are considered to be urgent whereby emergency work is being, or needs to be, undertaken to mitigate safety concerns. 'True' indicates they are urgent.

RoadworksDurationEnum.title: RoadworksDurationEnum
RoadworksDurationEnum.description: Expected durations of roadworks in general terms.

RoadworksScaleEnum.title: RoadworksScaleEnum
RoadworksScaleEnum.description: Grade of complexity of the roadworks according to the responsible road operator. For example determined by size, duration and/or traffic disruption.

ServiceDisruption.title: ServiceDisruption
ServiceDisruption.description: Details of disruption to normal services which may include roadside services such as those available at designated service areas, or any other relevant services such as nearby parking.

serviceDisruptionType.title: serviceDisruptionType
serviceDisruptionType.description: The type of service which is disrupted.

ServiceDisruptionTypeEnum.title: ServiceDisruptionTypeEnum
ServiceDisruptionTypeEnum.description: Types of disruption to services relevant to road users.

ServiceInformation.title: ServiceInformation
ServiceInformation.description: Information about a service which may influence the behaviour of drivers and hence the characteristics of the traffic flow.

SeverityEnum.title: SeverityEnum
SeverityEnum.description: Levels of severity of a situation as whole assessed by the impact that the situation may have on traffic flow as perceived by the supplier.

Situation.title: Situation
Situation.description: An identifiable instance of a traffic/travel situation comprising one or more traffic/travel circumstances which are linked by one or more causal relationships. Each traffic/travel circumstance is represented by a Situation Record.

overallSeverity.title: overallSeverity
overallSeverity.description: The overall assessment of the impact (in terms of severity) that the situation as a whole is having, or will have, on the traffic flow as perceived by the supplier.

situationVersionTime.title: situationVersionTime
situationVersionTime.description: The date/time that this current version of the Situation was written into the database of the supplier which is involved in the data exchange. Identity and version of the situation are defined by the class stereotype implementation.

relatedSituation.title: relatedSituation
relatedSituation.description: Reference to related situations via unique identifiers.

informationManager.title: informationManager
informationManager.description: Organisation that manages the information content (is responsible for updates of this information) typically the organisation that first made the DATEX II publication of this content.

situationSummary.title: situationSummary
situationSummary.description: A SituationRecord that provides a summary of the information described by the corresponding Situation, i.e. a superset of at least the location and validity information of all (other) SituationRecords in this Situation.

SituationPublication.title: SituationPublication
SituationPublication.description: A publication containing zero or more traffic/travel situations.

SituationRecord.title: SituationRecord
SituationRecord.description: An identifiable versioned instance of a single record/element within a situation.

situationRecordCreationReference.title: situationRecordCreationReference
situationRecordCreationReference.description: A unique alphanumeric reference (either an external reference or GUID) of the SituationRecord object (the first version of the record) that was created by the original supplier.

situationRecordCreationTime.title: situationRecordCreationTime
situationRecordCreationTime.description: The date/time that the SituationRecord object (the first version of the record) was created by the original supplier.

situationRecordObservationTime.title: situationRecordObservationTime
situationRecordObservationTime.description: The date/time that the information represented by the current version of the SituationRecord was observed by the original (potentially external) source of the information.

situationRecordVersionTime.title: situationRecordVersionTime
situationRecordVersionTime.description: The date/time that this current version of the SituationRecord within the situation was written into the database of the supplier which is involved in the data exchange. Identity and version of record are defined by the class stereotype implementation.

situationRecordFirstSupplierVersionTime.title: situationRecordFirstSupplierVersionTime
situationRecordFirstSupplierVersionTime.description: The date/time that the current version of the Situation Record was written into the database of the original supplier in the supply chain.

confidentialityOverride.title: confidentialityOverride
confidentialityOverride.description: The extent to which the related information may be circulated, according to the recipient type. Recipients must comply with this confidentiality statement. This overrides any confidentiality defined for the situation as a whole in the header information.

probabilityOfOccurrence.title: probabilityOfOccurrence
probabilityOfOccurrence.description: An assessment of the degree of likelihood that the reported event will occur.

severity.title: severity
severity.description: The assessment of the impact (in terms of severity) that this element of the situation is having, or will have, on the traffic flow as perceived by the supplier.

safetyRelatedMessage.title: safetyRelatedMessage
safetyRelatedMessage.description: Indicates, whether this SituationRecord specifies a safety related message according to Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) No 886/2013.

generalPublicComment.title: generalPublicComment
generalPublicComment.description: A comment which may be freely distributed to the general public

nonGeneralPublicComment.title: nonGeneralPublicComment
nonGeneralPublicComment.description: A comment which should not be distributed to the general public.

informationManagerOverride.title: informationManagerOverride
informationManagerOverride.description: Organisation that manages the information content (is responsible for updates of this information) typically the organisation that first made the DATEX II publication of this content. This value overrides any value specified at a more general level.

impactOnOppositeDirection.title: impactOnOppositeDirection
impactOnOppositeDirection.description: impact of the situation element on driving conditions in the opposite direction

objectReference.title: objectReference
objectReference.description: A reference to a specific versioned identifiable object, which may be in this publication or an external publication

objectReference.title: objectReference
objectReference.description: A reference to a specific versioned identifiable object, which may be in this publication or an external publication

SpeedManagement.title: SpeedManagement
SpeedManagement.description: Speed management action that is instigated by the network/road operator.

speedManagementType.title: speedManagementType
speedManagementType.description: Type of speed management action instigated by operator.

temporarySpeedLimit.title: temporarySpeedLimit
temporarySpeedLimit.description: Temporary limit defining the maximum advisory or mandatory speed of vehicles.

Subjects.title: Subjects
Subjects.description: The subjects with which the roadworks are associated.

subjectTypeOfWorks.title: subjectTypeOfWorks
subjectTypeOfWorks.description: The subject type of the roadworks (i.e. on what the construction or maintenance work is being performed).

numberOfSubjects.title: numberOfSubjects
numberOfSubjects.description: The number of subjects on which the roadworks (construction or maintenance) are being performed.

SubjectTypeOfWorksEnum.title: SubjectTypeOfWorksEnum
SubjectTypeOfWorksEnum.description: Subject types of construction or maintenance work.

TrafficConstrictionTypeEnum.title: TrafficConstrictionTypeEnum
TrafficConstrictionTypeEnum.description: Types of constriction to which traffic is subjected as a result of an event.

TrafficElement.title: TrafficElement
TrafficElement.description: An event which is not planned by the traffic operator, which is affecting, or has the potential to affect traffic flow.

trafficConstrictionType.title: trafficConstrictionType
trafficConstrictionType.description: The type of constriction to which traffic is subjected as a result of an unplanned event

TrafficFlowCharacteristicsEnum.title: TrafficFlowCharacteristicsEnum
TrafficFlowCharacteristicsEnum.description: Types of consistency (steadiness) of traffic flow.

TrafficTypeEnum.title: TrafficTypeEnum
TrafficTypeEnum.description: Types of traffic, mostly classified by its destination type.

TransitInformation.title: TransitInformation
TransitInformation.description: The availability of transit services and information relating to their departures. This is limited to those transit services which are of direct relevance to road users, e.g. connecting rail or ferry services.

journeyDestination.title: journeyDestination
journeyDestination.description: Indicates the stated termination point of the transit journey.

journeyOrigin.title: journeyOrigin
journeyOrigin.description: Indicates the stated starting point of the transit journey.

journeyReference.title: journeyReference
journeyReference.description: Indicates a transit service journey number.

transitServiceType.title: transitServiceType
transitServiceType.description: The type of transit service to which the information relates.

scheduledDepartureTime.title: scheduledDepartureTime
scheduledDepartureTime.description: Indicates the timetabled departure time of a transit service for a specified location.

TransitServiceTypeEnum.title: TransitServiceTypeEnum
TransitServiceTypeEnum.description: Types of transport services available to the general public.

VehicleObstruction.title: VehicleObstruction
VehicleObstruction.description: An obstruction on the road caused by one or more vehicles.

vehicleObstructionType.title: vehicleObstructionType
vehicleObstructionType.description: Characterization of an obstruction on the road caused by one or more vehicles.

vehicleProblemCause.title: vehicleProblemCause
vehicleProblemCause.description: The component of the vehicle that has the problem

VehicleProblemCauseEnum.title: VehicleProblemCauseEnum
VehicleProblemCauseEnum.description: The component of the vehicle that has caused a problem

WeatherRelatedRoadConditions.title: WeatherRelatedRoadConditions
WeatherRelatedRoadConditions.description: Road surface conditions that are related to the weather which may affect the driving conditions, such as ice, snow or water.

weatherRelatedRoadConditionType.title: weatherRelatedRoadConditionType
weatherRelatedRoadConditionType.description: The type of road surface condition that is related to the weather which is affecting the driving conditions.

WinterDrivingManagement.title: WinterDrivingManagement
WinterDrivingManagement.description: Winter driving management action that is instigated by the network/road operator.

winterEquipmentManagementType.title: winterEquipmentManagementType
winterEquipmentManagementType.description: Type of winter equipment management action instigated by operator.
